website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if your priority is a well-designed pillow.
pros: Includes an acupressure pillow for neck and shoulder issues
cons: The firmness of the acupressure points may cause discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: After reading several amazing reviews I broke down and ordered this for myself. I’ve had chronic back problems for years, so I thought why not at least try it. Even after buying it I looked at it for the last couple days unsure- THEN I pulled a muscle in my back during my morning workout- I’ve been laying low all day- then I remembered I purchased this mat. Well let me tell you, after just 10 minutes of laying on it my pain had vanished. I’m just blown away. My boyfriend also used it the other day, and after 20 minutes his pain was gone. I can’t recommend this enough
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Light

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me or my husband :(
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really wanted to love this product. I suffer from headaches and neck and shoulder pain and was hoping this would help. I have quite a few massage devices, stretch everyday, etc. however after using it according to the instructions it didn’t really do anything. The mat doesn’t hurt, however I think it takes pain away from a certain spot by triggering all of the receptors in your back and neck, your body gets confused.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Surprise, Surpise, surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I have a bulging disk C4 & C5. I use accupunture and it's expensive. This product is a back up when I can't get to accupuntrist and it works. Use for 20 minutes and it stimulates blow flow and relieves pain. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kisbel65

customer_reviews.title: amazing for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: this thing is life changing! i was hesitant at first but OMG it's so relaxing. i could lay on it all day! i prefer the mat to the pillow, but i usually use both.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I am fused from L3 to S1 and have crazy ...
customer_reviews.text: I am fused from L3 to S1 and have crazy spasms in my low back. I find that this gives actual relief to muscle spams and the nasty pain that often keeps me from doing what I want and need to do. A very simple device that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: A couple of days of use and you will be hooked
customer_reviews.text: This mat was recommended by a family member, and while I was skeptical at first - it is poking plastic "spikes" in your back after all - after a couple of days I love it. We travel with the mat, which is useful after a long, stressful day of meetings. Simply roll it out, stretch out, relax. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.Markel

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for the Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is ok. Im a little disappointed in the quality of the foam in the mat as well as the pillow. I dont have high hopes for long term survival. I was hoping for a little better materials considering I opted to pay a little more. Finally, take the vinyl carry and storage bag out of the equation for a buying decision. Its a piece of junk/joke. Its a shipping bag! If your just curious, or getting started using these mats, buy a $20 option and upgrade from there if you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Knut 2650

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty nifty! I don't know whether or not it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty nifty! I don't know whether or not it would solve any serious problems, but feels nice, has gotten rid of some headaches, certainly helps with muscular pain, and feels great with muscle soreness from exercise. I think its worth the price and definitely provides some temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Mobility
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's positive reviews are totally accurate. One thing I did hear in the reviews was how it aids in mobility. I've been suffering for months with a tight and cramped back. I was unable to touch my toe let a lone palm the floor. After a few sessions I can once again fold myself in half and hug my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Twenzel

customer_reviews.title: Painful item to use
customer_reviews.text: product was painful to use, several family members tried it and didn't like it.......this product only had a 30 day return policy when I tried to return it 7 days past the return time period.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, it really helps my back pain. I using it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baylen

customer_reviews.title: I'd go so far as to call this product a bit "dangerous."
customer_reviews.text: I bouight it for neck soreness. I saw the back accessory so I thought I'd try it though I did not have back problems. After one session for each, a) my neck was no better and b) my back, previously fine, was really sore for the rest of the day. Needless to say where this thing is going.
customer_reviews.author: Quality/Value Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Is mine defective?
customer_reviews.text: Look I love this... but I’ve had in a month and the pillow foam is squished and won’t support my neck. Please use stronger foam! Could be a life saver if this is improved...
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t give me any relief.
customer_reviews.text: The Nayoya didn’t help me and didn’t give any relief! I tried it for almost a month, haven’t noticed any changes!
customer_reviews.author: AVH

customer_reviews.title: The prongs are more like needles.
customer_reviews.text: Where is the "NO STARS" Too sharp, very uncomfortable. The prongs are more like needles.
customer_reviews.author: G Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pain
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty this thing is a lifesaver when ever your back or neck pain is acting up. Every time at night or day when I’m in a lot of pain I just lay on this for about 30 mins watching a show and I don’t feel any pain for that time. After you get off your skin kind of feels as if it has icy hot on it, it’s a little painful but not too bad. This won’t fix your problem but it will fix it when your on it, and that’s exactly what I needed it for (:
customer_reviews.author: Mint pod

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. The reviews here that are positive have to be a scam. I used numerous times, ok to lie on, but gives no positive relief.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Mosteller

customer_reviews.title: Hurts so good.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough how much I love this mat and pillow. It works..it really works. I absolutely love it. I suffer with horrible neck and back pain and this has been incredible. I’m even on vacation and never leave home without it. The only improvement I’d recommend is making the mat longer, so you can lay on it from neck to toes. Considering buying an additional mat so I can have a complete body work but other than that it is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain relief and relaxation
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months. The first time or two I used it I needed to have it on a softer surface but after that I put it directly on the floor and directly against my skin. For someone with back problems this mat has relieved a lot of pain and provided a way to relax and seek relief. Would love for it to be a little longer. If I put it in the small of my back it reaches the base of my neck. The pillow takes getting use to but I have used it for minor headache relief as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can’t return this. I gave it as a gift and he gave it back to after it cut his hand open. The plastic is to sharp and dangerous. I am stuck losing my money on this product that should not be allowed to even be sold.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pain relief
customer_reviews.text: As a Army veteran of 11 years, I have chronic pain. I ordered this as an attempt to see if help. I can say this is amazing. A little painful as first then warm then pain goes away. I frequently fall asleep while using this (not advised) This is the only product that works
customer_reviews.author: Quibbly

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money !
customer_reviews.text: This just did nothing for my pain or headaches. I'm sorry I wasted my money. When you're in pain I know I'll try anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve my chronic pain!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to explain it, but this mat really does help to relieve chronic pain. I have fibromyalgia and JRA. I have had to use various methods most of my life to help alleviate the pain, including medications. I hate taking medicine though and would rather not have my body full of drugs. This mat, and my TENs unit provide drug free pain relief, and also help relax me (helps insomnia). In 15 minutes I can generally get enough relief to be able to continue to function. So it's also faster than most medicines.
customer_reviews.author: DoraymeTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome myofascial release
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using multiple rollers and yoga for years because I had repetitive motion injuries from typing. The injuries are long in the past, now I do it to retain flexibility, keep blood and energy flow, and to feel great. Anyway this gets several areas at once and is awesomely effective! I do go easy on the head. The head does need releasing, especially around the ears, but this seems a bit intense for parts of the head. Otherwise I just put the mat on my pillow/bed when watching TV and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: azuremountain

customer_reviews.title: Ouch, only at first.  Serious back pain, GONE only after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Looove this product! Honestly, it hurts like hell when you first lay on it...aaand when you get off. Buuuut, you settle in within the first couple minutes and I find myself falling asleep on it almost every time. I’ve used it maybe 6 times. I quickly went from 5 minutes, to 15 minutes, to 50 minutes. Debilitating back pain, eliminated! Not just remedied breifly, but actually gone. I will mention that I don’t have chronic back pain. Maybe 2-4 times per month. I’m a bartender, I’m constantly hunched over and on my feet, I’m also over weight. Recommending this to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenopolis

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this only a couple times and not consistently to know if its really beneficial for 'said' issues, but when I lay on it, it does feel good. I'm a beginner and the 1st and 2nd stages didn't feel good, I was more comfortable on the advanced stage-laying on the ground and placing it behind my back, shoulders and neck. Yes, it takes getting used to but finding the position(s) where it feels good is awesome-even if you stay for 5-10 minutes! I would recommend if you're looking for acupressure therapy without spending all the $$ to find a real shop that is educated in this type of therapy.
customer_reviews.author: mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Crapoly! I ordered this based on the fact that it had so many good reviews and while I had high hopes for it, it far exceeded my expectations! I've been using it daily for about 3 weeks now and my chronic pain/discomfort that I've dealt with for more then 20 years has subsided to the point where I couldn't even tell you when the last time I remember feeling discomfort... and yes my sleep has improved too...its the craziest thing...anyway for the price, I highly recommend you give it a whirl if you have chronic back, neck or even hip issues...
customer_reviews.author: Emma Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing mat
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting some help from back and neck pain-- however, I do not feel this mat was at all helpful for any pain relief. Very dissapointed. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item last week after seeing an advertisement on it. Figured why not. Couldn’t hurt and it has good reviews. I’ve used it while laying in bed, on the floor, and couch. I have to admit it feels really good. Not sure if it’s helping with my back and neck pain but I’ve only used it for a week. Hopefully it will work to reduce some pain. Not expecting miracles of being pain free. I would recommend this product. It’s decent price. Again, it feels good laying on it. Even the husband agrees when he tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Totally works. I can lie down on it for a good 45 min. I have severe sciatica and I get relief from using this. Neck roll does hurt a bit but I've slowly gotten used to it
customer_reviews.author: LORENE

customer_reviews.title: It did feel good after getting off of it as the blood rushes ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use daily to see if it would help with my migraines. So far each day I used it I got a migraine shortly after but that's probably just me. It did feel good after getting off of it as the blood rushes back to the points.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: Not Eligible For Return
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping I would enjoy it after hearing good things about it. After trying it for myself I don't like it at all, it makes all sorts of health claims but for me I don't see any benefits. Unfortunately, this item is not eligible for return due to the specific sellers policy. I tried searching for their policy but only see a reference back to Amazon's general policy. If you are on the fence about this product, know that there is no opportunity to return it if it doesn't meet your expectations. I wish I hadn't wasted $40 on this gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not bad
customer_reviews.text: I don't really use the pillow, but I started laying on this for a bit before bed and I have been sleeping better. I have regular shoulder pain from bad posture, and was having trouble sleeping due to being uncomfortable. I didn't actually think this would help at all, so I am pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I had high hopes for this product. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had high hopes for this product. I’ve been using this for more than 5 months seeing if it works with time usage, but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Not that helpful
customer_reviews.text: Not that helpful, quality of plastic on acupressure points isn't that great. Hurts more than it helps and that is coming from someone who appreciates and enjoys acupuncture. Return window is to small for a busy adult so I am stuck with $40 piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I really believe in the modality of acupuncture but with current events being what they are can't pursue to see an provider comfortably. I was helping move boxes and furniture for four days and used this every night for 20 minutes and without it I wouldn't have been able to work past a day with back pain I normally experience. I am not kidding. This really helped. I am not even using it at the advanced stage and still benefited greatly. I would recommend and highly encourage daily use for benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Brinnylava

customer_reviews.title: Good for acute back pain
customer_reviews.text: It helps relieve acute back pains but is not a cure all treatment if that is what you are looking for. I suggest starting with a shirt on for a for like 10 minutes until you get used to it. I don’t know what it is doing but it relaxes me when I rest on it and I fall asleep everytime and then I wake up pain free and stress free.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: If you’ve had consistent back pain, this can be a solution for you too!
customer_reviews.text: If I could share the gift of this mat with everyone in the world we’d have a whole lot of people with less back pain. I played volleyball when I was younger and screwed up my back. After laying on this for about 25-40 mins (depending on how long I can stay awake on it, it relaxes you and makes you sleepy which is perfect before bed) my back gets a tingly sensation and I wake up feeling less pain the next morning. Trust me, this is a purchase you’ll never regret
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McElvy

customer_reviews.title: great for back and for feet, if you can work up the courage to stand on it!
customer_reviews.text: Long haired people: put your hair up if using the neck pillow, or use a hand towel over the pillow as your long hair will get caught in it. other than that, it works great, I use it weekly at least. Takes away aches in my back, de-stresses me. If you can work up the courage to stand on it, I highly recommend it! Start out with socks on first though, don't just go all in to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McDonald

customer_reviews.title: A real lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These have been a life saver for me. I have had a bad back for years, recently having nerves burned to help with the pain I use this almost daily. Once I start to feel pain, I lay on this. I frequently use it watching tv. I would be lost without it. Make sure you use it on bare skin. The first time I layed on it I thought, “there is no way I can lay on this”. It hurt like hell. I soon got used to it and absolutely would be lost without. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beckman

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of people, I spend my days either hunched over my desk or running around picking up the house/after my child. As a result I often get very sore shoulders and neck and have no time for a professional massage. This little gizmo is fantastic. Does it replace a trained massage therapist? No of course not, but even a fifteen minute session drastically improves my pain and tension. It looks a little scary but honestly does not hurt at all and after a few moments feel great. If you’re on the fence, give it a shot. It’s affordable and the results are great!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I love this, but it takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but it takes some getting used to. I have a lot of back pain from bad posture, and just ten minutes on this guy is magic. Much cheaper than massages!
customer_reviews.author: Cas Crim

customer_reviews.title: Daily part of morning routine now - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product after reading the book "Tribe of Mentors" by Tim Ferriss and has now become a part of my morning routine. Wake up, meditate on matt + pillow for a minimum of 15 minutes, and then finish my morning stretch. I suffer from neck pain, tweaked neck, and lower back pain, and this product helps with blood circulation. Plus, I like how easy it is to use, literally take out of the box and use it. I have recommended it to 5+ family members and friends and all are happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this set as a gift so I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift so I have not used it but the person I bought it for likes it. I received just the mat as a gift and use it daily. It works wonders. I was going to buy the mat for a friend of mine who has frequent back problems and saw this set with the pillow so I purchased him that. A few weeks later I was going to buy another set for myself but it was out of stock. That's what I get for procrastinating.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: it's like laying on a bed of prickly bits
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Nayoya matt for a couple of weeks. It still hurts to use it but I'm not giving up yet. I still can't lay on it without clothes despite using it regularly, it's like laying on a bed of prickly bits. I have a friend who loves hers so I'm going to keep trying it. I have a very painful back and I'm hoping this will help me.
customer_reviews.author: April Fountain

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help pain. It's poky and if you lay there long enough parts of your body will go numb so I guess you don't feel the pain that much then. But as soon as you stand up the pain is back. It's more useful as a deterrent to keep my son out of places he shouldn't be. I lay it on the ground and he won't walk on it because it's pokey.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Back and Gastro pain/symptoms
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I ever made to relieve my gastro symptoms. Get ready to fart like a Queen
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!  Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the worst thing I have ever purchased. It’s nothing more than a small very cheaply made pad covered in tiny plastic spike rings. It is literally useless! The neck pillow is also spike covered but the foam in that is very hard. I am totally unsatisfied with this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: It hurts so good.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s NOT comfortable, at all, but it’s not about comfort it’s about pressure points. Takes a while to get use to. I find no use in the pillow that comes with it. I prefer to stand on it and get pressure points activated rather than laying on it. If you can make it past 10 min you will feel the effects. But man....it’s hardcore to get use to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the recommendation of a few friends that have the same mat and use it frequently. It doesn’t totally replace my acupuncturist but I’ve been surprised and pleased at the level of relaxation achieved from daily 15 minute sessions. The “needles” are not terribly sharp and I haven’t had any issues with skin irritation. If you are missing your acupuncture sessions during quarantine or just want to dip your toe in the acupuncture pool and see how your body reacts, this is a great way to start.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for headaches.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a bit now. The back mat helps with pain while I'm on the mat, it's not always a sustained pain relief after use. I've actually been using the neck pillow way more. That pillow has actually helped with head aches and migraines where I didn't think that was possible. I've been pleased with the purchase and it's been completely worth it on the pillows capabilities alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. blackroses

customer_reviews.title: A juxtaposition. The mat causes pain to relieve pain.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I purchased this mat to relieve back pain from computer work. The bristles looked intimidating at first and I did not like the jnitial sensation. But after 5 minutes the prickles slowly dissapear and a good stimulating effect happens. I have used this for 3 years and every time I use it I fall asleep on the mat. I'd say it works good. The mat works better than the pillow. It appears the bristles need pressure for them to work properly. Pros: 1) Good quality mat. 2) Effective. 3) Mat is more effective than pillow. Cons: 1) Can be shocking to use at first.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Not my thing
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a product I enjoyed using, I've tried it a few times and I don't feel much pain relief, more discomfort from the plastic spikes. The pressure is enough to feel annoying but likely not enough to actually make any difference. I will stick to my back roller.
customer_reviews.author: Shycovian

customer_reviews.title: The spikes are nice and hard
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product. The spikes are nice and hard. The padding is just a thin piece of foam. So I wish the padding was a little thicker. Otherwise it feels amazing. Like the pillow and mat set.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: can cause severe red bumpy rash on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I _really_ wanted to like this product. It was HIGHLY recommended by the brainiac Tim Ferriss. However, I used it with a t-shirt on, and afterward, all over my back I noticed a pattern of very inflamed, raised red welts with small puncture marks at the center. My guess is that the plastic "nails" caused an allergic reaction. Not good. Not Good.
customer_reviews.author: Claire O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mostly for back and neck pain. I set it on my carpet and lay on top, trying to evenly place my body weight so I can get the full effects of the pressure points. I think everyone is different, but no matter how much weight I apply, I can hardly even feel the points digging into me. After laying for twenty minutes I do feel a little clearer in my head, so I think it might help relax your mind overall, but not in less pain. Which is why I bought it. Would return but of course I'm outside the 30 day return window. You are better off buying a cheap massager.
customer_reviews.author: DPearl

customer_reviews.title: You’ll feel the heat as your energy starts moving.
customer_reviews.text: This may might not be for everyone but I love it. It’s a little uncomfortable when you first use it. I recommend following the instructions. Once you are used to it, it really feels great if you lay on it for 20-30 minutes. For me, it’s best with my shirt off. The effects are stronger. Really make my sleep better. As for pain relief, I cant really say since I don’t have any chronic pain. It seems to help my hubby who does. He especially likes to stand on it with bare feet. His feet have stopped hurting so much since doing that.
customer_reviews.author: KindnessMatters

customer_reviews.title: Sound sleep, no back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this b/c I needed something for the constant achiness where shoulder and neck meet and regular massages aren’t in the budget. There are many ways to use it, I prefer to just lay down on it from tummy to shoulders and put the head roll under my neck- I did NOT need to work up my time on it- it feels great! I’m curious to know what the other, more costly versions do for you.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I read others' reviews and the product guidelines, then lay my mat down in front of the tv to relax for a long session. At times I felt nothing, then waves of warmth came over me at times, it's very relaxing and not painful at all. I'm looking forward to updating my review after consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalSteve

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have scoliosis, insomnia and I work out. This really help me feel at ease, it’s truly like meditation. The first day I tried it, I was caught off guard but it quickly went away. I usually roll a bit from side to side as well, it feels great. Especially with my shirt off. Using this before bed knocks me OUT. And although there is no cure for scoliosis pain, I’m down for the temporary relief.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for pain relief and also as a mindfulness tool. I haven't been using it as often as I would like because I just don't want to be without clothes for even a moment during the winter. When I do use it, I find it releases lots of winter muscle tension as well. That being said, I was initially confused about the carrying case but it seems like the ugly bulky box it comes in is the carrying case, which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and relaxation in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 64 year old lady with moderate RA and sciatica. The only approach to managing my pain is holistic. The acupressure mat and neck roll gives almost instant pain relief to the point I have to be careful not to fall asleep. If it’s pain management or just relaxation after a long day I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It helps and I actually sleep on it. When I wake up my back does not hurt. I don like popping a lot of pills so its a great way to relieve pain with out all the reliance on pain killers I also recommend doing excercises to help with lower back pain but this is great...you can also stand on it with your feet to help with headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica LaDuke

customer_reviews.title: What is this magical mat?!
customer_reviews.text: What is this magic?! Yes- it hurts at first. But THEN! Feel the heat your back makes and just sink into the oblivion. I like to lay on this while doing an hour long guided meditation- I usually end up falling asleep, and then just roll onto my bed and sleep completely soundly the rest of the night. This is a wonderful product! Disclaimer: I don’t have any specific pain issues. However, as a 42 year old woman, those normal aches and pains seem to be lifted as a result of laying on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: KSkeens

customer_reviews.title: Laying on this feels pretty good and if I position it just right
customer_reviews.text: Laying on this feels pretty good and if I position it just right, it seems to allow my neck to fall into place. That said, I don't think it lives up to all of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic lower back pain. I was able to lay down on it on the floor immediately, didn't hurt, just felt interesting. I got up after 15 minutes and felt warmth go through my whole body. I could move with ease and no pain right afterward. I felt like a new person. I literally cried tears of joy after getting up. I never thought I could feel such relief. I am amazed and have told all of my friends to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally saw the Pranamat on Instagram but it was like $250 (holiday markdown) and the testimonials raves about the pain relief benefits. So I did some general research and this brand made top of the list on a few health blogs. Best of all, it as only $40 bucks. So I figured I had nothing to loose and could just return if I didn’t like it. Well, I loved it and learned the testimonials are real. This relieved my back and neck tension within about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Reviews!!!! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but trusted the thousands of positive reviews. I’m glad I did! This thing is life changing. I went straight for the “advanced” position and laid on it on the floor for 45 minutes. The first 5 minutes are a little painful but then the pain relief and all over body warmness kicks in. This helped me significantly with menstrual cramps and low back pain in addition to the normal neck and shoulder tension from a computer job.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Felt relief within minutes. Slept great.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mat. Within minutes of laying down on it I felt relief. The sensation that came over my body is the same feeling after a deep massage where I felt like I was floating and tingling. After a couple minutes, I started leaning even deeper into the neck pillow. My therapist recommended I try an acupuncture mat a few months ago because I struggle with sleeping. I’ve only used the mat once so far and slept great last night so I will be trying this again. This was my first time ever trying an acupuncture mat and I am so glad I did! 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zipidity Doo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has severe neck and back pain. While she was weary of it at first, she has become addicted to using it. She even said she used it when going on a 2 hour drive for the weekend. A really great purchase that I will be getting for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: So painful
customer_reviews.text: It might work but not worth it. The first couple times I used it I could tell a difference afterwards but honestly the pain it cause was not worth the benefit. I purchased an inversion table and an accupressure vibrator which has worked wonders
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: It’s Just Gone...
customer_reviews.text: My pain vanished. I used the Solidback for quite some time, which works wonders. But sometimes, I just don’t have the time to lie down on it. It takes a bit too long to reap the benefits. I went home from work today for lunch, and saw it on my doorstep. I used it for less than three minutes and headed back to work. My back pain is gone. Completely. Using this after the Solidback seems like a great way to not only stretch but stimulate the back into feeling better. I recommend this better than I recommend my best friend for any job listing ever.
customer_reviews.author: WINH4X 🎮

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I have had back problems for a long time and had to take anti inflammatory medicine for that but since I have my nayoya My back pain is much better and I don’t need the medicine anymore. I’m addictive to my nayoya, it also helps relieve headaches, don’t hesitate to try this wonderful invention.
customer_reviews.author: icb16

customer_reviews.title: Feel relaxed and lighter
customer_reviews.text: This product is really great. The first time I used it, I felt lighter and relaxed. Each time I use it now I feel so relaxed and stress free. If my back is tight, it alleviates the pressure. The feeling is hard to describe as it is prickly and you can feel the circulation, but it is a nice feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Wodecki

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little doubtful but because of the reviews I got it. No regretting this purchase. This is amazing. It hurt a little at the beginning but then is just a pain taker
customer_reviews.author: antonella

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I true Yogi - Not!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be life changing, and although I feel like a true Yogi laying on this matter/pillow combination - not sure it does anything other than hurts my back if I am on it longer than 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Elfant

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing experience
customer_reviews.text: Was a little uncertain about this one, but thought I'd give it a try. I do feel much more relaxed after 20 to 30 minutes use, but I'm not sure if that's because of the product or because I'm forcing myself to be still for that time. Standing on it is supposed to help with headaches, but I haven't worked my way up to putting my full weight on my feet on the mat yet.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and I'm constantly on the lookout for various items that I think might help clients with their pains when they can't come in for a massage. I have tried it (and need to start using it again). I normally lay on it with on my bed with my shirt off for about 15 minutes. It is painful at first, but then my back warms up and I feel relaxed laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Take time and allow yourself to adjust to the mat in increments.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. May take some people time to adjust to the plastic spikes. Do not slide on the mat when getting off or you may accidentally scratch yourself. Produced a very good increase in blood circulation in my back, neck, head, face, thighs and knees. Work up to 30-45 minutes once you have acclimated to the mat. Extremely relaxing. Place a pillow or bolster under your knees if you have lower back problems. This will take the pressure off the lower back. I am a massage therapist and have recommended this to some of my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Marion A. Hochberg

customer_reviews.title: Helps tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: It actually really does help my tension headaches, but I wish the pillow was firmer. It’s begun to squish into itself, but to be fair I press my neck/occipital skull pretty hard into it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: It feels great!
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived I thought, "OUCH!" when i looked at all of the spikes, but I was very pleasantly surprised to find that the mat only takes one or two sessions to get used to. I use it with just a bra on. The neck pillow I keep in the family room and use it every night when I watch TV. I am very pleased with my purchase!!! TY!
customer_reviews.author: C. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nayoya Back and Neck Pain Relief-Accupressure Mat and Pillow
customer_reviews.text: The Nayoya back and neck pain has really helped me get through the yard and garden work this spring. It took a while but I can stand or lay on the mat and pillow for about ten minutes now. I feel so much better after a session. I would recommend ordering this product if you have back or neck pains. It has made a difference because there is less pain to deal with after all the lifting, weeding in the backyard spring cleanup. It arrived on time and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried it right away. It's a comfortable poke on each spike. It just makes me relax immediately. Wearing a layer of clothing would be recommended so you won't feel surpise specially on first feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tesya

customer_reviews.title: I can tell on days that I do not use my acupuncture pillow
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from lower back pain and this mat and pillow greatly help to reduce my pain...not solve or fix, but at least help me get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this mat and pillow. This is my first set I've purchased before. I have fibromyalgia so I tend to have a lot of aches, this really does help release some of that pressure! I love the neck pillow!! That has to be my favorite part of this. I highly recommend it! Quality is great, I have washed the mat before and hung it up to dry and it has held up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Not painful!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used acupressure before, but this was actually pretty nice. I wear a lightweight shirt when using it. The first time I used it, I fell asleep and had the best sleep I have ever had. Now, I lay on it for a while before bed, because I was hard to wake up when I fell asleep on it. I have chronic back pain and sciatica, and this helps relieve it. The carrying case was not good, so I’m ordering a small duffel bag for it.
customer_reviews.author: Vaelorn

customer_reviews.title: Works great but has formaldahyde in the foam
customer_reviews.text: The foam has a formaldayde smell. I took the foam out from inside both parts and have it airing out in the basement. That said, I think this mat is a great help for people with fibromyalgia. It relieves the pain in my feet, legs and thighs. I gave it an overall rating of 3 stars because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davila

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I have some lower back issues and a neck spasm/upper spine issue (from multiple computer monitor station.) This product takes a little getting used to but it is working for me with both the lower back issue and the neck issue. (I started with 15-minutes and then built up to 45-60 minutes; and it's helping a lot.)
customer_reviews.author: R Jack

customer_reviews.title: Thank u NAYONYA!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I love it! Nothing worked for my neck pain. I've gotten massages, I've been to chiropractors, and I've been on pain medicine for the last 3 years. (Nothing really helped my neck pain) when I bought the NAYONYA I was very skeptical, but it worked great my pain for the last 3 days has been at an 2 out of 10. I'm very excited to see if I can one day get rid of my neck pain once and for all!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected and more. I love that the head roll is separated from the mat. I have lots of neck issues so sometimes I will lie in bed with just the head roll which helps so much. The fabric and materials of the mat and head roll itself are excellent. The Vinyl travel bag however is not. The zipper broke on it the first time I unzipped it. Which is ok. I wasn’t buying it for the travel bag, but it would have been nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his back pain. He says this is just painful to use. So he only gave it a few seconds 1 time. I'm hoping he gives it another real try and that it actually helps, but I'm not very hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kuehl

customer_reviews.title: Acupressure Mat
customer_reviews.text: I think this is amazing. I'm not sure that it does much for pain, but it is super relaxing. I can see why people say they fall asleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leer

customer_reviews.title: No more massages
customer_reviews.text: I used to get massages at least twice a month. This May has solved my lower back pain problem. Do yourself a favor and try this product 10 min a day. Game changer. I recently took a work trip didn’t take this with me and my lower back tightened up like crazy being in a hotel for a few days. Using this daily releases all tightness in my back and your body naturally adjusts to how to use it it’s hard to explain. Just buy it and try it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for sciatica pain
customer_reviews.text: I have had sciatica pain and tried the hot and cold packs, pain releivers and chiropractor stuff..paid a lot of money trying to keep my pain down but did not help much. I was searching in Amazon for sciatica pain releif, I found this This nayoya acupressure mat stuff just held to receive my sciatica pain and I do 45 mins daily. Can tell this as a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji Soundararajan

customer_reviews.title: Ouchie
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this mat for sleep and relaxation, but I just couldn’t get used to the aharpness of the astoc pieces. I couldn’t relax! My friend raves about this so it works for some, unfortunately not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a big bang for your buck! Loved by my whole family...
customer_reviews.text: If you use this often and daily, the relaxation you get is great. This is not as prickly as some other brands, but it is perfect! My whole family is enjoying it. It is always out and ready to be laid on. The pillow is also a nice addition for the neck, and for someone like me with neck problems it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrschanman

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I don't use this a lot like I thought I would, I really should. It's very relaxing and taking time out for yourself helps EVERY ONE you are in contact with! The head pillow is my absolute favorite. I read that if you have a headache I do love how this simple item works but the fault of not using it is my own. I need to take time for ME more!
customer_reviews.author: Ky WomanTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: This what I had been looking for to release myself from back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This material is magic. Few weeks ago I couldn't imagine that I will released from pain at this time. Since I started using this mat, it looks like I've never had pain previously. I recommend it everyone who feels back pain, stress, and other, to use this mat. It's very reliable. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for minor back pain
customer_reviews.text: I pinched a nerve in my back. Although this didn't help take the problem away. It did help distract the nerve pain with the pinches. And I do think the added circulation helped while on it. This mat can hurt if you move too much while on it. Lie still and it actually feels so good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ambrosi

customer_reviews.title: Magical mat/pillow combo!
customer_reviews.text: This is pure voodoo magic mat or something. How can it fix so much so quickly? I am on the extreme side of skeptical spectrum but this little thing just won me over. If you buy this, do remember that wearing a shirt and using this combo mat/pillow does almost nothing. You can practice but for full results, take off your shirt and trust the mat! You will love the magic.
customer_reviews.author: SoloDene

product_meta.title: At Home Back and Neck Pain Relief - Acupressure Mat and Neck Pillow Set - Relieves Stress and Sciatic Pain for Optimal Health and Wellness - Comes in a Carry Box with Handle for Storage and Travel
feature_bullets: IMMEDIATE back and neck pain relief in the comfort of your home in as little as 20 minutes per day
ELIMINATES the need for expensive treatments as well as therapist, masseuse and chiropractor visits
EFFECTIVELY induces a state of complete relaxation while reducing aches, pain, stress and tension
RELIEVES not only back, neck, shoulder and sciatic pain whether mild or chronic but also relieves headaches
OTHER BENEFITS include improved circulation, sleep, and mood as well an increase in energy levels. This item is backed by a lifetime money back guarantee
